SELECT COUNT(*) AS allBoardCount FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO
WHERE B.BOARD_GROUP_NO = #{board_group_no}
AND B.MEMBER_NO = #{member_no}
AND B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND M.MEMBER_NICK LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR M.MEMBER_NICK LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND REGEXP_LIKE (B.BOARD_TAG_NAME, '^HTML|^JAVA|^CSS|^C|^JS|^SQL|^PYTHON')
AND LOWER(B.BOARD_TAG_NAME) LIKE '%'||#{board_tag_name}||'%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOW_NO = #{follow_no} AND FOLLOWING_MEMBER_NO = #{member_no}

SELECT M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_EMAIL, F.FOLLOW_DATE, M.MEMBER_NICK, M.MEMBER_POINT, M.MEMBER_PROFILE
FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN FOLLOW F ON M.MEMBER_NICK = F.MEMBER_NICK
WHERE M.MEMBER_NO IN (SELECT FOLLOWING_MEMBER_NO FROM FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOW_NO = #{member_no})
